Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface TaskTimeoutRequestFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleNodeConfig.DefaultTaskTimeoutRequestFilter
    public interface TaskTimeoutRequestFilter
    Provides a way to control timeout behavior for various BleTask instances. Assign an instance to BleNodeConfig.taskTimeoutRequestFilter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please
      Use static constructor methods to create instances to return from onEvent(TaskTimeoutRequestEvent).
      static class  TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.TaskTimeoutRequestEvent
      Event passed to onEvent(TaskTimeoutRequestEvent) that provides information about the BleTask that will soon be executed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please onEvent​(TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.TaskTimeoutRequestEvent e)
      Implement this to have fine-grained control over BleTask timeout behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please onEvent​(TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.TaskTimeoutRequestEvent e)
        Implement this to have fine-grained control over BleTask timeout behavior.
